sailpoint.integration

Class RemoteIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.integration.RemoteIntegration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntegrationInterface

    public class RemoteIntegration
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntegrationInterface
    Implementation of IntegrationInterface that uses REST resources to communicate with the provisioning system over HTTP.

        public RequestResult getRequestStatus(java.lang.String requestID)
